file_content.text: What went wrong?
I calculated precisely. You should be dead.
I should have known.
I thought I'd programmed the perfect killing machine for you. I was painstakingly precise.
After all our time together, have you not realized that I am unbeatable?
I cannot be killed.
I'm at a loss.
This proves you are inept. I'm better off without someone who makes such a mistake.
You're a failure.
Perhaps you're right.
Your droids pushed me. It was a valiant attempt.
Don't be so hard on yourself.
That's little consolation.
Quinn, your luck never seems to run out.
Your mercy is a great example to me, master.
I find this decision curious. But you are the master.
I have betrayed you. Conspired with your most hated enemy.
I don't expect your mercy.
I know it is meaningless to express my deep regret. I don't expect your mercy.
I understand your confusion. Baras can be very persuasive. I forgive you, Quinn.
I can be merciful.
My lord, I'm... this is unexpected. Darth Baras would never forgive such a failure.
My lord, I am deeply grateful. Darth Baras would never afford me the same forgiveness.
If you will permit me to stay in your charge, my dedication to you will never come into question again.
I'll be keeping an eye on you, just the same.
We'll see.
Of course, my lord.
The slate is clean, Quinn.
I know.
I will not hesitate to destroy you the next time.
Be sure that is the case.
There will be no next time. I swear.
Trust is difficult to rebuild, Quinn. But I'm willing to try.
We'll see.
I'll understand if things are different for a while.
You can rejoin the crew, but you are no longer welcome in my quarters.
We are breaking up.
My actions have cost me dearly, then.
You'll just have to make this up to me in private, Captain.
[Flirt] All is forgiven.
That can be arranged. My lord.
This interruption has delayed you enough. I'm eager to return to the ship and put this behind us.
The ship is through there. Prepare for departure. I'll join you shortly.
Whatever you say.
Let's go, Quinn.
It will be good to get back to our standard routines.
You heard the master, Quinn.
We comply.
Of course, my lord.
One thing, my lord--do you plan on telling the others what happened?
No one else must know. It would compromise your ability to lead. Am I understood?
You'd be undermined.
When it's appropriate, I will inform them.
They will be told sometime.
Don't worry. This will just be between you and me, Quinn.
Your secret's safe with me.
I appreciate it, my lord.
I will see you back at the ship.
We'll see you back at the ship.
Don't worry. This will just be between the three of us. Understood?
Your secret's safe with us.
I know Basic.
Noted.
It is for the best.
I suppose so.
You are clan leader.
Surprised to see me? Surprised that this is not a transponder station?
I'm not sure what's going on here, but it takes a lot to faze me.
Nothing surprises me.
Well, try this on for size.
My lord. I could not leave you to this fate without showing the respect of being here to witness it.
Get back to the ship, Captain. I didn't say you could disembark.
What are you doing here?
I've been disobeying many of your orders for quite some time.
I regret that I have been disobeying many of your orders of late, my lord.
Not quite sure what you mean, but I'm happy to have you on my missions.
You're always welcome.
I'm not joining your mission here, my lord. I'm thwarting it.
You just can't stand to be away from me, can you, dear?
[Flirt] Did you get lonely?
I have enjoyed your company and companionship, my lord. That's why this is so hard.
End of the line for me, my lord. Or, I should say, for you.
What are you talking about, Captain?
What do you mean?
Something up your sleeve, Quinn? Are you making a play against me?
Sounds like a threat.
You catch on quickly. Luckily, not quickly enough.
Have we reached the transponder station?
Is this our destination?
Not even close. There's no need to invade the transponder station.
This entire excursion has been a ruse. There is no martial law order and no special signal emitter.
My lord, I regret that our paths must diverge. Out of respect, I wanted to be here to witness your fate.
What fate, Quinn? What are you talking about?
What do you mean?
This sounds bad.
Your senses have always been keen.
That's what I like about you, Quinn--your flare for the theatrical.
You're always so dramatic.
It's true, I have set this stage, my lord.
Have you found someone else? If you say, it's not me, it's you, I won't be responsible for my actions.
Are you breaking up with me?
It's not me or you. It's Darth Baras. I owe him more than you could imagine.
It pains me, but this entire scenario is a ruse. There's no martial law and no special signal emitter.
Baras is my true master. He had me lure you here to have you killed.
Think this through, Quinn, before it goes too far.
Don't be rash.
You know me--I never act without consideration. Baras saved my career, and he'll save the Empire.
Don't insult me by suggesting I'm acting rashly. I've watched you destroy countless loyal Imperials, while sparing our enemies.
And here I thought you loved me.
Our romance dies in flames.
I thought our relationship was real. I thought we cared about each other.
Don't I mean anything to you?
After all we've been through together? I even helped you take out Moff Broysc.
I've fought for you!
You've helped me immensely. I act today with a heavy heart. But without Baras, I'd have no career.
This is the worst betrayal possible.
How could you?
I act today with a heavy heart. Baras has always been the anchor of my career and, in my opinion, of the Empire.
It figures. You can't trust anyone anymore.
Well, why not?
Since your schism with Baras, I've wrestled with my conscience. And I've watched you destroy countless loyal Imperials, while sparing many enemies.
If you are allied with that fool, you will receive no mercy from me.
Then you deserve death.
I'll happily share his fate if it means standing against you. You've destroyed countless loyal Imperials, while sparing many of our enemies.
I'm convinced you do not have the Empire's best wishes at heart. At least I know Darth Baras is trying to win this war.
I arrived at this moment after much deliberation. Baras has always been the anchor of my career and, in my opinion, of the Empire.
I didn't want to choose between the two of you. But he's forced my hand, and I must side with him.
I knew there was a reason I wanted to put a gun to his head the minute I met him.
You're about to get your chance.
Your wish is coming true.
Let's hear the man out, but be ready.
Steady, Lieutenant.
The captain will realize he's making an incredible mistake.
Quinn is not the enemy.
Pierce, Baras asked me if you'd be a valuable asset. I told him you were physically capable but not worth the trouble. Sorry.
Ha. You think I'd join you and some cowardly puppeteer? You guys are going nowhere.
Wow, Captain Boredom makes a wake-up call. Did not see this coming.
Keep quiet, Vette, and ready yourself for the fight.
Reserve the chatter.
He fooled us both, all this time.
Nor I.
It hasn't been easy keeping the truth hidden.
Don't worry, he'll realize he's making a big mistake.
Quinn's just confused.
Vette, ever since my lord removed your shock collar, you have been an insufferable pain.
Vette, once my lord is gone, I'll be in control of your shock collar, and your disciplining will make sense.
You know what, I say we kill this Imperial punk.
Charming to the last. No more time to waste. It's my extreme pleasure to take you out of the equation....
Quinn, this is a terrible mistake. We will make the Empire better.
You should pay attention. This is a bad career move.
Listen to her, Quinn.
Let me do the talking, and be ready to strike.
Save your breath, Jaesa.
Something tells me Quinn's idea of better may not coincide with ours.
Better is subjective.
This kind of intrigue makes my spine tingle. I'd love to kill a traitor.
Jaesa, you have no idea how long I've held my breath hoping you wouldn't use your power on me.
Baras specifically expressed that I should extend his welcoming hand to you. Join us.
Are you kidding me? I may sense nothing but confidence in you, but... haha.
You could have stopped me long before my preparations were complete. Now I have the upper hand.
Master, his confidence is quite high. I see little to no doubt in him.
Your powers will be a great benefit when Baras has turned you to him, Jaesa. For now, I can't have you disrupting my calculations....
More betrayal! We must cleanse the clan!
Sharpen your claws, Broonmark. You're about to get them bloody.
Ready yourself.
Hold still, Broonmark. We won't attack hastily.
Patience.
Yes, it seems there is always more cleansing to be done.
A never-ending demand.
Broonmark, Darth Baras has no quarrel with you. Join me and he will welcome you to the fold.
You insult us. We never betray. Our pledge is complete. Our pledge is always.
Always is about to become a very short amount of time. Sorry, Broonmark, but I can't have you disrupting my calculations....
Baras and I have been planning this for some time. You'll have to face this fight alone, my lord.
Once you're gone, your crew will either join Baras with me, or be killed.
Your master will run the Empire right into the ground.
Baras is only out for himself.
Baras has always been one step ahead of every enemy. He'll lead us to victory.
You know who I'm working for now, Captain. If you stand with Baras, you stand against the Emperor himself.
Baras defies the Emperor.
The Emperor is an absentee landlord. Baras is doing what any real patriot would do.
I really thought you were smarter than this.
You're a fool, Quinn.
I'll show you how smart I am.
After all this time observing you in battle, I have exhaustively noted your strengths and weaknesses.
These war droids have been programmed specifically to combat you. I calculate a near zero percent chance of their failure.
Your confidence in the odds is your biggest weakness.
Stats are unreliable.
If anything, I'm underestimating my droid's chances. You'll find they are virtually immune to you.
You always did talk too much.
Shut up. [Attack]
Sounds grim. I know how thorough you are, Quinn. I'm sure this will be my greatest test.
Then I'm in trouble.
And if I'm right, your last.
It's time for you to meet your end.
I'm sorry it's come to this, my lord.
I will keep you alive, and we will see if you earn my trust again.
You'll live... barely. [Choke him]
You're still useful to me.
